Name: Switch & Ditch
About the game: Steal The Spotlight! In the near future there is but one goal, fame . Join three others in the biggest game show on earth! Do you have what it takes to be the last man standing? Do you have what it takes to make sure the other competitors will not steal the spotlight for themselves? Show everyone watching that you are the best and steal the spotlight in Switch & Ditch. Push, punch and throw your way to the top in this four-player brawl game! Features Throw your enemies behind obstacles or straight out of the spotlight to kill them Increase your ego by filling your fame bar Triumph in local multiplayer against friends, family and foe Choose between different characters and make sure your character is the last man standing Enter the training mode to prepare for the showdown!
